definition.name: Azure Machine Learning Workspace
definition.description: Connect to or create an Azure Machine Learning Workspace with this GitHub Action
definition.author: azure/gh-aml

inputs.name: azure_credentials
inputs.description: Paste output of `az ad sp create-for-rbac --name <your-sp-name> --role contributor --scopes /subscriptions/<your-subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/<your-rg> --sdk-auth` as value of secret variable: AZURE_CREDENTIALS

inputs.name: parameters_file
inputs.description: JSON file including the parameters of the workspace.

evidence.reasoning: This action is primarily focused on creating or connecting to an Azure Machine Learning Workspace, which falls under Infrastructure. It also requires Azure credentials for authentication, making it relevant for both Authentication and Deployment categories.
